column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''22''' is the twenty-second issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "Words and Devices: Still at Large There Were Giants, Part 2" (column) [[Patrick H. Wynne]] and [[Carl F. Hostetter]].

* "Transitions in Translations": Runot suomentanut Panu Pekkanen" (column)<ref>Contents of the column: "'Runot suomentanut Panu Pekkanen'"; "More Notes from the Russian Front", by [[David Doughan]].</ref> — [[Arden R. Smith]].
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
